Thermodynamics of Information

Juan M. R. Parrondo, Jordan M. Horowitz and Takahiro Sagawa

Journal Club 10/01/2015

1867: Maxwell's demon

http://creatureandcreator.ca/

1929: Szilard Engine

Rod Vance, Information is Physical blog post

1951: Landauer's principle

$$\Delta S = k_BT \ln{2} $$

Landauer, R. “Irreversibility and Heat Generation in the Computing Process.” IBM Journal of Research and Development 5, no. 3 (July 1961): 183–91. doi:10.1147/rd.53.0183.

1948: Shannon Information

$$H(\rho)=-\sum_x \rho(x) \ln{\rho(x)}$$

Shannon, Claude Elwood. “A Mathematical Theory of Communication.” ACM SIGMOBILE Mobile Computing and Communications Review 5, no. 1 (2001): 3–55.
Toyabe, Shoichi, Takahiro Sagawa, Masahito Ueda, Eiro Muneyuki, and Masaki Sano. “Experimental Demonstration of Information-to-Energy Conversion and Validation of the Generalized Jarzynski Equality.” Nature Physics 6, no. 12 (December 2010): 988–92. doi:10.1038/nphys1821.

Experimental verification of Landauer's principle

Bérut, Antoine, Artak Arakelyan, Artyom Petrosyan, Sergio Ciliberto, Raoul Dillenschneider, and Eric Lutz. “Experimental Verification of Landauer/’s Principle Linking Information and Thermodynamics.” Nature 483, no. 7388 (2012): 187–89.

Experimental verification of Landauer's principle

Bérut, Antoine, Artak Arakelyan, Artyom Petrosyan, Sergio Ciliberto, Raoul Dillenschneider, and Eric Lutz. “Experimental Verification of Landauer/’s Principle Linking Information and Thermodynamics.” Nature 483, no. 7388 (2012): 187–89.

Symmetry breaking

Roldán, É, I. A. Martínez, J. M. R. Parrondo, and D. Petrov. “Universal Features in the Energetics of Symmetry Breaking.” Nature Physics 10, no. 6 (June 2014): 457–61. doi:10.1038/nphys2940.

$$F=E-TS$$

Daniel Schroeder, Weber State University

$$F=E-TS$$

$$S=S(\rho^{eq})=-k_B\sum_x \rho^{eq}(x) \ln{\rho^{eq}(x)}$$

$$E=\langle\mathcal{H^{eq}} \rangle_{\rho_{eq}}$$

$$\rho^{eq}(x)=e^{-\beta \mathcal{H^{eq}(x)}/Z_0}$$

Non-Equilibirum Free Energy

$$\mathcal{F}(\rho,\mathcal{H})=\langle\mathcal{H} \rangle_{\rho} - TS(\rho)$$

Parrondo, Juan M. R., Jordan M. Horowitz, and Takahiro Sagawa. “Thermodynamics of Information.” Nature Physics 11, no. 2 (February 2015): 131–39. doi:10.1038/nphys3230.

$$W_1=\langle\mathcal{H^{\rho}} \rangle_{\rho}-\langle\mathcal{H^{eq}} \rangle_{\rho_{eq}}$$

$$W_2=F(\rho_{eq})-F(\rho)$$

$$W_{driv}=W_1+W_2$$

$$W_{driv}=F(\rho_{eq})-\mathcal{F}(\rho,\mathcal{H}_{eq})$$

Parrondo, Juan M. R., Jordan M. Horowitz, and Takahiro Sagawa. “Thermodynamics of Information.” Nature Physics 11, no. 2 (February 2015): 131–39. doi:10.1038/nphys3230.

$$\mathcal{F}(\rho,\mathcal{H}_{eq})-F=k_BTI(\rho,\rho_{eq})$$

$$I(\rho,\rho_{eq})=\sum\rho \ln{\frac{\rho}{\rho_{eq}}}$$

Normal Thermo

$$\Delta F = \Delta E - T \Delta S$$

$$\Delta F = Q+ W - T (\frac{Q}{T}+\Delta S_i)$$

$$\Delta F = W -T\Delta S_i$$

$$W-\Delta F =T\Delta S_i \geq 0$$

Non-Equ Thermo

$$\Delta \mathcal{F} = \Delta F +k_B T\Delta I$$

$$W-\Delta F-k_B T \Delta I = T \Delta S_i \geq 0$$

So What?

$$-W_{eq \rightarrow eq}=-\Delta F-T\Delta S_i$$

$$-W_{non-eq \rightarrow non-eq}=-W_{eq \rightarrow eq}+k_B T \Delta I$$

We can extract more work if $$I(0)\geq I(t)$$

Back to Szilard and Maxwell

$$I(0)=N \ln{2}$$

No action: information is lost

Reinsert partition, then QS transformation:

$$-W=\int_{V/2}^{V}PdV$$

$$-W=Nk_BT \ln{2}$$

There's more!

  • Fluctuation theorems
  • Measurement as conditioning
  • Derivations (classical, quantum, stochastic)
  • Physical information
